Dialogue.Value: The ROM logo is projected on,a large screen.
Looks like it’s a special display,that detects unauthorized users,and restricts sensitive data.
Even though you can jack in，,the data will still be hidden.
I don’t know what’s inside，but,it’s heavy!
It’s probably nothing we can,use on such short notice.
I don’t know what’s inside，but,it’s heavy!
It’s sealed tight anyways.,I’d need a crowbar to pry it,open.
A shifting Cain cipher?,No，no，the periodicity’s all,wrong.
Or maybe this repeating,“78234528” is just a distraction,from the real data.... Hmm.
Aha! A leftover invoice!,20 gallons of alkahest agent，,from.... June Corp. to W3 Ltd.
I’ll pass it on to the analysts.,This could let us uncover more,ROM fronts and accomplices.
